laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Illumigene DNA amplification assay for toxigenic C. difficile
laboratory_examinations.findings: Negative for toxigenic C. difficile by the Illumigene DNA amplification assay. (Reference Range-Negative).

The lungs are clear without consolidation or edema. There is no pleural effusion or pneumothorax. The heart size is mildly enlarged, unchanged from prior CT, and slightly increased in size from prior radiograph.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Heart size has slightly increased from the prior radiograph.
